item.title: Finnish Authorities Seize Russian Cargo Liner After Suspected Undersea Telecom Cable Sabotage: Report
item.description: Finnish authorities seize Russian cargo ship suspected of sabotaging undersea cables in Gulf of Finland amid Russia-Ukraine conflict. read more

item.title: Amazon Permits Remote Work For Employees Stuck In India As Visa Processing Slows: Report
item.description: Amazon allows employees stranded in India due to visa delays to work remotely until early March. Restrictions apply. read more

item.title: Elon Musk Donated Over 210,000 Tesla Shares Worth Almost $100 Million: 'Part Of Year End Tax Planning,' Says Sawyer Merritt
item.description: Elon Musk donates over 210,000 TSLA shares worth almost $100 million, touts paying taxes to the Internal Revenue Service. read more

item.title: Trump Withdraws National Guard From Chicago, Los Angeles, Portland, Says Forces Will Return If 'Crime Begins To Soar'
item.description: Trump withdraws National Guard from Chicago, LA, and Portland amid legal challenges. Warns that forces may return if crime rises. read more

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Sworn In As New York City's Youngest Mayor In A Century, Touts 'New Era' For Big Apple
item.description: Zohran Mamdani sworn in as 112th Mayor of NYC in private ceremony following historic democratic win over Sliwa and Cuomo. read more
